DOC.criteria: Postpubertal healthy individual age 1825years Participants ineligible significant medical condition ( e.g . personal history clinical manifestation cardiovascular disease , type 2 diabetes ) , strong family history diabetes cardiovascular disease ( e.g . firstdegree relative ) , take concomitant medication ( eg : metformin ) , smoke drink > 140g alcohol/week , , bear prematurely ( < 37 week ) , mother gestational diabetes .
